primary_objectives.name: Chains of Will
primary_objectives.description: At the end of each turn, score 5 VP for each Primary Objective you have currently Bound.

special_rules.name: Bind Action
special_rules.description:
All models gain the following action:
Bind (Action): Target a Primary Objective within 1" that you Control. That objective becomes Bound until Bound by another model, or the binding model is Taken Out of Action.

primary_objectives.name: Grip the Hollow
primary_objectives.description: At the end of each turn, score 5 VP for each Primary Objective you control.

special_rules.name: Control Requirement
special_rules.description: A Primary Objective is only considered Controlled if a player has at least 3 Claim within 1".

primary_objectives.name: Endure the Claim
primary_objectives.description: At the end of each turn, score 5 VP for each Primary Objective you control if you controlled that Primary Objective at the start of the turn.

primary_objectives.name: Turn the Cycle
primary_objectives.description:
At the end of the turn, except the last turn, score 3 VP for each Primary Objective you control.
At the end of the last turn, score 6 VP for each Primary Objective you control.

primary_objectives.name: Silence the Field
primary_objectives.description:
At the end of the turn, score 3 VP for each Primary Objective you control.
At the end of the turn, if you control all Primary Objectives, score 5 VP.

primary_objectives.name: Final Binding
primary_objectives.description: At the end of the last turn, score 15 VP for each Primary Objective you control.

primary_objectives.name: Cradle the Flame
primary_objectives.description: At the end of each turn, score 10 VP if you control the Active Primary Objective.

special_rules.name: Active Objective
special_rules.description: At the start of each turn, randomly select 1 Primary Objective Marker to be the Active objective until the end of the turn.

primary_objectives.name: Blooded Covenant
primary_objectives.description:
At the end of the turn, score 8 VP for each Primary Objective where all following statements are true:
  • The Primary Objective is Sated
  • You control the Primary Objective
  • The model that made the Deliver Offering Action has not been Taken Out of Action

special_rules.name: Offering System
special_rules.description:
Each player starts with 3 Offering Tokens, evenly divided among models of their choice.
Each model with an Offering Token gains the following action:
Deliver Offering Action: Target a Primary Objective the model Contest and Control.

primary_objectives.name: Break the Chain
primary_objectives.description:
At the end of the turn, score 3 VP for each Primary Objective you control.
At the end of the game, score 8 VP for each Primary Objective you have Destroyed.

special_rules.name: Demolish Action
special_rules.description:
All models gain the Demolish Action:
Demolish (Action): Target one Primary Objective you Control within 1". That Primary Objective is considered Destroyed. Remove that Primary Objective Marker from the board.

primary_objectives.name: Spine and Spoke
primary_objectives.description: At the end of the turn, for each Primary Objective you control, score 2 VP for each Secondary Objective you control.

primary_objectives.name: Scars Etched Deep
primary_objectives.description:
At the end of each turn, score 1 VP for each Primary Objective you control
At the end of the game, score 1 Victory Point for every 3 Wounds you have inflicted on enemy models.

primary_objectives.name: The Tithe of Flesh
primary_objectives.description:
At the end of each turn, score 1 VP for each Primary Objective you control
At the end of the game, score 3 Victory Point for every enemy models that is Taken Out of Action.

primary_objectives.name: Echoes of Violence
primary_objectives.description:
At the end of each turn, score 1 VP for each Primary Objective you control
At the end of each turn, score 5 VP if any enemy models has been Taken Out of Action this turn.

primary_objectives.name: Hold Through Ash
primary_objectives.description:
At the end of each turn, score 3 VP for each Primary Objective you control.
Score an additional 2 VP if you controlled it at the start of the turn.

primary_objectives.name: The Unquiet Pulse
primary_objectives.description:
At the end of each turn, score 1 VP for each Primary Objective you control.
Score an additional 2 VP if that Primary Objective has a Charged Token.
Score an additional 3 VP if that Primary Objective has an Unstable Token.

special_rules.name: Token System
special_rules.description:
At the end of each turn, after scoring VP, place a Charged Token on each Primary Objective you control.
If that Primary Objective already had a Charged Token, place an Unstable Token instead.
If that Primary Objective already had an Unstable Token, all models within 3" suffers 1D6 Damage and the Primary Objective Marker is removed from the board.

At the end of each turn, if no models are contesting a Primary Objective, remove all Charged and Unstable Tokens from that Primary Objective.
